title: Unju - The Jump
description: Emma’s eyes flash open when she wakes with a start to the unmistakable sense of her body sinking into the ground. Her heart is racing – ba-bum, ba-bum, ba-bum – and then, chest pains. Am I having a heart attack? No, don’t be ridiculous, calm down. Trying to master her confusion she draws a long, deep breath, and relieffloods over her when realization dawns that she is in the safety of her bed. It was only a dream...Somewhere in the multiverse lives a little girl with a unique ability… and she is not the only one.
author: Gleneley Stander
